mapper.select: SELECT AV.VHC_ID , DC2.DL_CD AS AD_LVL , AV.AD_POS , V.AD_ROUT , DC2.DL_CD_NM AS AD_LVL_NM , V.VHC_NO , DC.TXT_VAL1 AS AD_POS_TYPE_NM , DC.DL_CD_NM AS AD_POS_NM , S.UNIT_AMT FROM AD_VHC_INFO AS AV LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DC ON AV.AD_POS = DC.DL_CD AND DC.CO_CD = 'AD_POS' LEFT OUTER JOIN BM_VHC_INFO V ON AV.VHC_ID = V.VHC_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DC2 ON V.AD_LVL = DC2.DL_CD AND DC2.CO_CD = 'AD_LVL' LEFT OUTER JOIN AD_STD_PRICE S ON S.PRICE_TYPE = #{value} AND S.AD_LVL = DC2.DL_CD AND S.AD_POS = DC.DL_CD ORDER BY AV.VHC_ID ASC, AD_POS_TYPE_NM DESC, DC.SORT_ODR ASC

SELECT II.PRICE_TYPE , V.AD_LVL , I.AD_POS , I.INST_ID , I.VHC_ID FROM AD_INST_DL I LEFT OUTER JOIN BM_VHC_INFO V ON I.VHC_ID = V.VHC_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN AD_INST_INFO II ON I.INST_ID = II.INST_ID AND II.PRICE_TYPE = #{priceType} WHERE I.INST_ID = #{instId}

SELECT I.INST_ID , I.INST_NM , I.CUST_ID , C.CUST_NM , I.AD_ST_DATE , I.AD_ED_DATE , I.AD_AMT , I.REMARK , I.CONFIRM_YN , I.PRICE_TYPE , I.CONFIRM_YN FROM AD_INST_INFO I LEFT OUTER JOIN BM_CUST_INFO C ON I.CUST_ID = C.CUST_ID WHERE I.PRICE_TYPE = #{value}
